org.purl.test
Class simplePurlClient

java.lang.Object
  org.purl.test.simplePurlClient

public final class simplePurlClient
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a RESTful test harness for a PURL service. Also serves as example code demonstrating the PURL client API.
